src:
34M巨乳發大財　美魔女「胸口碎大石」賺到買小島
01 Nov 2019, 03:49 by 吳妍
美國美魔女賽克斯（Susan Sykes）現年53歲，擁有令人瞠目結舌的34M巨乳，原本是個大窮鬼的她，多年前在節目《美國達人秀》（America's Got Talent）一展長才，靠著「兩粒」碎西瓜、碎大石知名度大增，受邀巡演賺不少錢，如今已經買下一座小島當起島主，相當勵志。
據外媒報導，賽克斯16歲就因這對34M巨乳飽受同儕歧視，2008年上《美國達人秀》表演意外爆紅，創下1分鐘內連碎34個罐子的紀錄，不但讓她留名成為金氏世界紀錄保持人，還因此賺進大把鈔票，在緬因州買下1座小島，除此之外，賽克斯還買了山中渡假小屋，日子過得相當優渥。
不過風光背後也有辛酸，賽克斯表示，某次受邀日本表演「胸部碎瓦片」，但節目準備的瓦片太堅固，導致最後她胸部受傷，整片瘀青兩週。2012年參加電影《大獨裁者落難記》拍攝時，也被安排「胸部撞碎門」橋段，當時胸部也受了不小的傷。
現在賽克斯已經可以豁達地面對各種批評、惡意眼光，對於自己無堅不摧的「胸器」，還能為自己賺進大把鈔票，賽克斯感到十分滿意。
更新時間｜2019.11.01 03:48
text:
34M big breasts make big money, the beautiful witch "broken big stone" earned to buy a small island
01 Nov 2019, 03:49 by Wu Hao
Susan Sykes, a 53-year-old American woman, has a jaw-dropping 34M big breast. She was originally a big poor man. She was a long-time winner of the show "America's Got Talent". Thanks to the "two grains" of broken watermelons, the popularity of broken stones has increased greatly, and the tour has earned a lot of money. Now I have bought a small island as an island owner, which is quite inspirational.
According to foreign media reports, Sykes was 16 years old because of the discrimination against 34M breasts. In 2008, the performance of "American Talent Show" was unexpectedly red, setting a record of 34 cans in 1 minute, not only let her stay. The name became the world record holder of King's, and he earned a lot of money and bought a small island in Maine. In addition, Sikes also bought a mountain resort house, and the days were quite good.
However, there is also a bitterness behind the scenery. Sykes said that he was invited to perform "Chest Broken Tiles" in Japan, but the tiles prepared for the show were too strong, resulting in her chest injury and the whole film for two weeks. In 2012, when he was filmed in the film "The Great Dictator's Difficulty", he was also arranged to "brake the chest to break the door". At that time, the chest was also injured.
Now Sykes has been able to openly face all kinds of criticisms and malicious eyes. For his own "thorch" that he can't resist, he can make a lot of money for himself. Sikes is very satisfied.
Update time|2019.11.01 03:48
